articles.title: Madonna’s Final Celebration Tour Concert Takes Over Copabacana Beach in Rio — Here’s How to Watch in the U.S. - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: The massive show will only be broadcast locally in Brazil on Saturday, May 4, but there are a few ways for those in the U.S. to stream it online.
articles.content:
Madonna is showing her appreciation for fans with a free concert on Saturday, May 4, at the Copacabana Beach in Rio de Janeiro — the final stop of her Celebration Tour.

articles.title: Dua Lipa opens up about the aftermath of her BRITs 'New Rules' meme: "It was humiliating" - NME
articles.description: Dua Lipa has opened up about her viral 'New Rules' meme mocking her dancing, telling The Guardian: "it was humiliating".
articles.content:
Dua Lipa has opened up about the aftermath of her performance of ‘New Rules’ at the BRITs, which was made into a meme.
